record.description: This link relation type is used to identify a resource for sending push messages.
record.contact: The WEBPUSH WG of the IETF (webpush@ietf.org)

record.description: This link relation type is used to identify a collection of push message subscriptions.
record.contact: The WEBPUSH WG of the IETF (webpush@ietf.org)

record.description: This link relation type is used to identify a resource for receiving delivery confirmations for push messages.
record.contact: The WEBPUSH WG of the IETF (webpush@ietf.org)
